mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(user_id, group_id, type, title, content) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{group_id}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT comment.id, comment.user_id, `user`.name as userName, time, board_id, `type`, content FROM `comment` inner join `user` on `user`.id = `comment`.user_id WHERE board_id=#{board_id};
